description: This file defines the UserService class which manages user-related operations such as creating users, retrieving a user by ID, and listing all users within the backend service of a taxi booking application.

classes.name: UserService
classes.description: Service class providing user management functionalities in the backend.

methods.name: createUser
methods.description: Creates a new user from the request data and saves it to the repository.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a user by ID or throws NotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: listAll
methods.description: Returns a list of all users.
